hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:The Prophet (ﷺ) used to offer as sacrifices, two horned rams, black and white in color, and used to put his foot on their sides and slaughter them with his own hands

chapter.ara-name: باب وَضْعِ الْقَدَمِ عَلَى صَفْحِ الذَّبِيحَةِ
chapter.eng-name: To put one's foot on the side of the animal at the time of slaughtering
